ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Recite: In the Name of your Lord who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: READ IN THE name of your Lord who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recite in the name of your Lord Who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), read in the name of your Lord who created (all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Read with the name of your Lord Who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Read! In the Name of your Lord Who created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Read in the name of your Lord Who created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Recite: In the Name of thy Lord who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Read: In the name of thy Lord Who createth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Read! In the name of your Lord, who created:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recite thou in the name of thy Lord Who hath created -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Read in the Name of your Lord who created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Proclaim! (or read!) in the name of thy Lord and Cherisher, Who created-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Read! In the Name of your Lord, Who has created (all that exists),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Read (Prophet Muhammad) in the Name of your Lord who created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Read: In the Name of your Lord who created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:1] (Meccan, consisting of 19 verses; from the beginning of it up to [the verse] what he did not know, was the first of the Qur’ān to be revealed, in the cave at Hirā’, as reported by al-Bukhārī.) Recite, bring recitation into existence, beginning with: In the Name of your Lord Who created, all creatures;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Read): '(Read) He says: Read, Muhammad, the Qur'an; this is the first revelation that Gabriel brought down: (In the name of thy Lord) by the command of your Lord (Who createth) the created beings,
